answers.answer: I have no idea why my question posted in this forum
Hi, test your blood sugars, and then  you'll know if you do or don't have a problem still.

question: I had been taking Abilify for ten years. Recently I found out that l have prediabetes. I realized that the medicine is probably the cause. I weaned myself off it. I am now completely off it. Do I still have to worry about high blood sugar levels? BTW Ive been off it for at least 5 months and I have not had any problems psych wise.
title: Abilify and diabetes
